alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 2:58PM EDT until August 26 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Western New Haven County in southern Connecticut... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 257 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Weston, or 8 miles northwest of Bridgeport, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Trumbull around 310 PM EDT. Stratford around 315 PM EDT. Milford and Shelton around 320 PM EDT. Derby around 325 PM EDT. Seymour and Orange around 330 PM EDT. Woodbridge around 335 PM EDT. Naugatuck and Beacon Falls around 340 PM EDT. Hamden and Bethany around 345 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
